mapper.select: select id,CREATE_TIME createTime,type,user_name userName,sn,descript,sn_type snType from pay_log where id=#{id}

select pl.id id,pl.CREATE_TIME createTime,pl.type type,pl.user_name userName,pl.sn sn,pl.sn_type snType, pl.descript descript,pl.request_data requestData,pl.response_data responseData, client.username clientNo,client.`name` clientName, merchant.username merchantNo,merchant.`name` merchantName, pcc.`name` clientChannelName,pmc.`name` merchantChannelName from pay_log pl left join sys_user client on pl.client_id=client.id left join sys_user merchant on pl.merchant_id=merchant.id left join pay_client_channel pcc on pl.client_channel_id=pcc.id left join pay_merchant_channel pmc on pl.merchant_channel_id=pmc.id where pl.id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from pay_log where id in (${_parameter})
